clipBoardCopyError:
Your browser isn't Html5 ou your machine doesn't accept automatic copy to the clipboard !
Do it your self.
signUpPwdHolder: Enter a password with at least 6 characters.
menuSafeModeTitle: Switching to secure or normal mode
deleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete this item ?
about: English translation of documentation
warning: MyBox is provided as-is without warranty of any kind or contractual liability.
This online version should be used to test the application.
The used hosting server does not guarantee you that the security issues, backup or confidentiality are treated
as they would be if you choosed yourself the server (based on the importance of the data entered).
To have total control, you need to download (free) source or executable version
and install it on an host server of your choice.
contact me at info@pixaline.net, if you don't know to do it yourself.
alertBeforeFolderCreation: You don't have yet created folder, nor form.
Click on up-right menu , then on 'Folders and forms management'.
Then, it's recommended to create at least one folder (orange button), in which
you can create your forms (blue button).
A folder 'Confidential' in which you will put the form 'Usernames and password'
alertBeforeFormCreation: You've already create one or more folders, but none form.
Vous can create your first form by clicking
on up-right menu, then on 'Folders and forms management'.
emptyFieldDescription: You don't have defined any field's description for this form ! Go to 'Folders and forms management' to define fields.
goToSafeMode: In 'secure' mode your password is never saved.
But you've to validate entered data before to be absent
because server will disconnect you after a short time of inactivity.
Do you confirm the switch to secure mode
goToNoSafeMode: NO secure mode is more comfortable because you're never disconnected without asking it.
But it is advisable only if you are the unique user of this machine because
username and password are saved locally.
Do you confirm the switch to NO secure mode
tipArray: When you click on a folder (orange) or a form (blue),
The 'path' of the tree appears at the top of the app.
To return to the 'root' of the tree
Click the up arrow at the top left of the screen.
use the left arrow at the top left to go back.
If you are in 'administration' you'll return to 'normal' mode.
If you are in 'normal' mode you'll back to the login page.
To be sure you always have the latest version and consistency of all files :
either in the settings of your mobile
or in the browser history of your PC/Mac.
elemDoesntExist: Strange ! item doesn't existe in the database !
invalidFormOwner: Strange ! It seems you aren't the owner of this item !
parentFormDoesntExist: Strange ! Then form doesn't exist or isn't valid !
pwdLengthError: Password must have 6 characters at least !
confirmPwdError: Then password and its confirmation are different !
connectAlreadyExists: A Connection already exists. Restart application please !
connectionHasBeenClosed:
The server has disconnected you. Since you are in secure mode :
signin again on an other tab if possible,
otherwise click on menu then 'Logoff/signin'
connectionIsNotValid: The Connection is no more valid. signin again please !
name: Name :
formHaventData:
This form is empty ! Add records (blue button at bottom)
or go to 'Folders and forms management' to Remove it.
formTableDontExists:
This form is empty ! !
Use blue/gray button at bottom to add records.
